OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , parallel-group study . Patients randomize 1 2 arm . - Randomized phase : - Arm I : Patients receive oral high-dose modafinil twice daily . - Arm II : Patients receive oral low-dose modafinil twice daily . In arm , treatment phase continue 3 week follow 1-week washout period . - Extended treatment phase : After 1-week washout period , patient receive oral low-dose modafinil daily day 1-3 . The dose titrate optimal level administer divided dos . Fatigue , neurobehavioral dysfunction , quality life assess randomized phase baseline day 7 21 extended treatment phase baseline day 28 56 .
